text: Jack and the Beanstalk is a 1902 American silent adventure movie directed by George S. Fleming and Edwin S. PorterCharles Musser. Before the Nickelodeon: Edwin S. Porter and the Edison Manufacturing CompanyJack and the Beanstalk and stars James H. White, Thomas White, and Elsie Ferguson. ==Actors== * James H. White as Farmer * Thomas White as Jack * Elsie Ferguson as Fairy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1902 movies Category:1900s adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American silent movies
title: Jack and the Beanstalk (1902 movie)
